task.title: Vegan New Orleans Coffee
task.shortdesc: New Orleans coffee is known for its chocolate-caramel flavor. It captures the culture of one of America's most famous cities and there is a way to make it work for vegans!

taskbody.context:
Below are the ingredients and steps needed to make vegan New Orleans coffee.
Ingredients:
4 tablespoons of drip-ground coffee
2 tablespoons of chicory
¼ tablespoon of salt
4 cups of filtered water
Sugar
Steps:
Set up your coffee maker so you can add water into the filter anually.
Place the coffee, chicory and salt into filter in brewing basket
Bring the water to a boil
Add enough water to moisten the grounds and chicory, then pour ½ cup of water into filter
Wait for the water to drip through, then add another ½ cup of water. Repeat until you have brewed all 4 cups
Add your preferred amount of sugar
Serve while still steaming
